commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking three types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
* Deadline: tasks that need to be done 
before a specific date/time
* Event: tasks that start at a specific time and 
ends at a specific time
* Todo: tasks without any date/time attached to it

* Remove whitespace in Todo's description
* Remove unnecessary newlines when printing

DukeException handles
* empty input
* empty task description
* invalid dates for Deadline and Event

ExceptionType enum to represent different exception types
* empty input
* empty description
* invalid date

Duke handles the following errors:
* empty user input
* invalid command
* empty task description
* invalid date/time for Deadline and Event
* task to be marked/unmarked does not exist
Replace tasks Array with ArrayList

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Parser.java to handle input parsing
commitResults.messageBody: Parser class: add methods to parse command and arguments

Create a Duke class to run the chatbot. Add methods to handle greeting,
exiting, printing messages, as well as processing commands
so that codes will be neater.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ErrorMessage.java to store error messages
Add FileUtil to handle file operations
commitResults.messageBody:
* write tasks to file
* read tasks from file

Task, Todo, Deadline, Event class: Add method to format tasks
for saving to file

Update test case and expected output

Duke class: Add initialiseTasks() method to initialize
list with saved tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Task objects: store dates as a java.time.LocalDate

commitResults.messageBody:
* Task class: add getter methods after changing attributes to private
* Task, Deadline, Event todo classes: remove
unnecessary formatForFile() method

* Add Ui class to deal with interactions with the user
* Add Storage class to deal with loading tasks from the file
and saving tasks in the file
* Add TaskList class to deal with add/delete tasks in the list

* Remove unnecessary FileUtil class

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize the classes into java packages
commitResults.messageBody:
Extract more *Command classes that inherit from Command class:
* Add, Delete, Exit, List, Mark, Unmark classes

Add StorageException class to handle exceptions related to storage

Parser class: update parseCommand() method to return *Command object
Task, Deadline, Event classes: add equals() method

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code to comply with the Coding Standard
Add FindCommand class to find a task with a keyword

commitResults.messageBody:
Ui class: add printFoundTasks() method for FindCommand class

Task, Deadline, Event classes: add formatForFile() methods

Storage class: remove encodeTaskList(), encodeTaskToString(),
decodeTaskList(), decodeTaskFromString() methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Use CheckStyle to fix some violations
commitResults.messageBody:
Update Duke's GUI.

* Customize DialogBox to look like a text bubble.
* User picture is clipped to a circle.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify getTasksWithKeyword() method to use regex
commitResults.messageBody:
Method loops through the list and adds tasks containing the
keyword, even if it's just a substring, to a new list.

Regex adds only the task containing the whole keyword.

Let's,
* update the algorithm to use match whole words only
* use Streams

commitResults.messageTitle: Main class: set title and icon for customization
commitResults.messageBody: Task, Event, Deadline classes: remove unnecessary getters

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify *Command and Ui classes to use string format
commitResults.messageBody:
String appending is long and messy.

Use String.format() which is neater and easier to read.
Store messages as constant for easier updating in the future.

commitResults.messageTitle: Parser class: Apply SLAP to parseCommand() method
commitResults.messageBody:
parseCommand() is too long (exceeds 30 LOC) and has common
behaviors. The common behaviors across cases cause code duplication.

Extracting the common behavior into methods that allows us to reuse
them when dealing with the different commands. For example, validity
checking of the index can be done in a method and called repeatedly
for mark, unmark and delete commands.

Let's put the various validity checks into new, smaller methods
that can be called by different cases.

commitResults.messageTitle: TaskList class: extract a common index conversion method
commitResults.messageBody:
getTask() and deleteTask() have some common behavior (converting
one-based index to zero-based).

Extracting the common behavior into method that allows us to reuse
them. For example, both getTask() and deleteTask() can now call
convertIndexToZeroBased().

Task, Deadline, Event classes: remove unnecessary equals() method

Update JUnit tests

Set up CI with gradle.yml

Task, Deadline, Event classes: add getDate() method

TaskList class: add method that filters for tasks that
occurs on a specified date.

Ui class: update showTasks() method to display tasks that
occurs on a specified date.

Parser class: add method to create new ScheduleCommand
